comments.body: Probably worth removing the duplicated `set`s at the beginning and end and fixing the indentation.

this is copy-pasted (you canâ€™t avoid it, this is a bootstrapping problem, this is the logic for locating dependencies, if you try to factor it out, you canâ€™t locate the factored out code). I wouldnâ€™t modify this in any way.
I hoped that removing the `set`s and changing the indentation was safe enough, but I trust your judgement. ðŸ™‚

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +16,20 @@      source "$(grep -sm1 "^$f " "$0.runfiles_manifest" | cut -f2- -d' ')" 2>/dev/null || \
      source "$(grep -sm1 "^$f " "$0.exe.runfiles_manifest" | cut -f2- -d' ')" 2>/dev/null || \
      { echo>&2 "ERROR: cannot find $f"; exit 1; }; f=; set -e
# --- end runfiles.bash initialization v2 ---
